quoteText:
Any claim, cause of action, demand, or dispute arising from or related to CL ("Claims") will be governed by the internal laws of California, without regard to conflict of law provisions, except to the extent governed by US federal law.
Any Claims will be exclusively resolved by courts in San Francisco, CA (except we may seek preliminary or injunctive relief anywhere).
title: The court of law governing the terms is in California

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
